product_name: KIALOA Keiki II Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Kids'
long_description: This stand up paddle has all the important features needed for a kids' paddle, including a smaller shaft, a smaller adjustable range, a manageable blade size and the ability to float.
short_description: This stand up paddle has all the important features needed for a kids' paddle, including a smaller shaft, a smaller adjustable range, a manageable blade size and the ability to float.
